title: 92/564/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 November 1992 granting a Community financial contribution to expenditure incurred by Luxembourg in establishing the Community vineyard register (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 26 November 1992  granting a Community financial contribution to expenditure incurred by Luxembourg in establishing the Community vineyard register  (Only the French text is binding)  (92/564/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF  THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Community shall grant a contribution amounting to the total given in column 2 in the Annex hereto towards expenditure incurred by Luxembourg in establishing the Community vineyard register.
This Decision is addressed to Luxembourg.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 November 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 208, 31. 7. 1986, p. 1. (2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 23. (3) OJ No L 94, 28. 4. 1970, p. 13. (4) OJ No L 185, 15. 7. 1988, p. 1.
ANNEX
(Luxembourg francs)
Expenditure   Community contribution (50 %)   1  2      1988  870 952  435 476  1989  11 126 740  5 563 370  1990  12 573 610  6 286 805  1991  1 409 048  704 524      Total  25 980 350  12 990 175
